articles.content:
National photo exhibition on 3rd anniversary of President Kim Il Sung's death
Pyongyang, July 2 (KCNA) -- A national photo exhibition opened at the People's Palace of Culture on July 1 on the threshold of the 3rd anniversary of the death of  President Kim Il Sung.
   On display at the exhibition hall are more than 180 photos dealing with the glorious and brilliant revolutionary history of the President and his undying exploits and with the heroic struggle of the Korean people and People's Army soldiers to implement his last teachings closely united around Secretary Kim Jong Il. 
   The opening ceremony was attended by Kim Ki Nam, Secretary of the Central Committee of the Workers' Party of Korea.

National fine art exhibition opens
Pyongyang, July 3 (KCNA) -- A national fine art exhibition "The great leader comrade Kim Il Sung will always be with us " opened at the Korean Art Gallery on July 2 with due ceremony.
   On display in the exhibition hall are more than 100 art pieces. Among them are paintings showing the revolutionary activities, noble traits and undying exploits of President Kim Il Sung and the wise leadership and great traits of Secretary Kim Jong Il, who is successfully carrying forward and accomplishing the revolutionary cause of the President.

articles.title: Pomminryon's declaration of reunification favoured
articles.content:
President Kim Il Sung's reminiscences published in Yugoslavia
 Pyongyang, July 4 (KCNA) -- The Kultura Publishing House of Yugoslavia brought out the first volume of anti-Japanese revolution, the first part of  " With the Century"   , reminiscences of President Kim Il Sung, on the occasion of the 3rd anniversary of his death.
   In the preface, it wrote that it publishes the reminiscences on the third anniversary of the death of President of the Democratic People's Republic of Korea Kim Il Sung, the founder of Juche idea and an elder statesman of the world.

articles.title: Floral basket to Statue of President Kim Il Sung from Thailand
articles.content:
Pomminryon's declaration of reunification favoured
 Pyongyang, July 5 (KCNA) -- Rodong Sinmun in a signed article today supports a declaration of national reunification published by the National Alliance for the Country's Reunification (Pomminryon) on July 2 on the occasion of the 25th anniversary of the publication of the July 4 North-South Joint Statement.
   The article says:
   Pomminryon's publication of the declaration of national reunification demonstrated again the will of all the fellow countrymen to reunify the country at an early date by the concerted efforts of patriotic-minded people true to the noble idea laid down in the July 4 North-South Joint Statement= it is an epochal and realistic measure to push ahead with reunification movement on a nation-wide scale.
   The reunification of the country should be realised on the basis of the independent viewpoints of the 70 million Korean people as well as their strength and wisdom and in a peaceful way, not by means of war. All the fellow countrymen should unite into one, transcending the difference in ideology, ideal and social system to this end.
   That is why in the declaration of national reunification Pomminryon called upon all the Koreans to turn out in a struggle to adhere to the three principles of national reunification as a reunification programme and charter and carry them into practice.
   The organisation also reiterated that Korea should be reunified by a confederacy formula based on one nation, one state, two systems and two governments. Its call reflects the specific conditions of the country.
   The confederacy formula is the best way of achieving reunification with the north and south not fighting with each other nor encroaching upon each other's interests.
   All the Koreans in the north, south and abroad should firmly unite under the banner of the three principles of national reunification, frustrate the manoeuvrings of the separatist forces at home and abroad and turn out as one in a sacred, patriotic struggle to achieve national reunification, the cherished desire of the nation, at an early date.

Floral baskets from Japan laid before Statue of President Kim Il Sung
Pyongyang, July 6 (KCNA) -- Floral baskets sent by the President of the Liaison Council of the Society of Japanese Teachers for the Study of the Juche Idea, the Chiba, Japan, Prefectural Society for the Study of the Juche Idea, the President of the Japan-Korea Society for Scientific and Educational Interchange and other organisations and public figures were laid before the Statue of President Kim Il Sung on Mansu Hill in Pyongyang on July 4 and 5 on the occasion of his third death anniversary.

articles.title: Container wharf project of Chongjin Port completed
articles.content:
Press review 
  Pyongyang, July 7 (KCNA) -- Rodong Sinmun reports that memorial and commemorating meetings were held in different countries and foreign newspapers and magazines carried special write-ups on the occasion of the third anniversary of the death of the great leader President Kim Il Sung.
   The daily also reports that Secretary Kim Jong Il extended thanks to teachers, researchers and working people for their successful scientific researches.
   It is reported in the press that floral baskets were sent by Libyan leader Moammer El Gaddafi and Japanese organizations in commemoration of the third anniversary of President Kim Il Sung.
   Papers devote one whole page to an epic "May Kim Il Sung homeland prosper " dedicated to the anniversary.
   Under the fixed title "the great leader comrade Kim Il Sung will always be with us", Rodong Sinmun allots one whole page to pictures of the president with children.
   "Enduring feats of the great leader are basis of Korean revolution" is the title of a Rodong Sinmun article.
   With the banner headline "Let us hold the great comrade Kim Il Sung in high esteem as eternal leader of our Party and people and sun of Juche " printed in the top of the second and third pages, Minju Joson carries a political essay saying the President beaming with a smile is always with the Korean people, and articles and pictures.
   President Kim Il Sung put his last signature to a document concerning national reunification on july 7, 1994, a day before he passed away. On this anniversary, papers come out with articles on the efforts and achievements he made for the country's reunification.
   Given in the press is an account of a meeting held by unionists to make a pledge on the occasion of the third anniversary of the President.
   Rodong Sinmun flashes a report that Korean Taekwon-do players won eleven gold medals in the first three days of the tenth World Taekwon-do Championship.
   Printed in the daily is a statement released by the north headquarters of the National Alliance for the Country's Reunification (pomminryon) urging the release of south Korean patriotic champions of reunification.
   On the threshold of the third anniversary of the President, a memorial delegation of the National Democratic Front of South Korea (NDFSK) was interviewed by KCNA at the NDFSK Pyongyang mission on Sunday, reports the daily.
   In a commentary Minju Joson urges that the U.S. hawks renounce the anachronistic policy of strength and immediately withdraw U.S. forces from forward areas of south Korea and Japan.
   Rodong Sinmun says in an article that if non-aligned and other developing nations pool strength, they can live by their own efforts.

articles.title: DPRK books donated to Cambodia
articles.content:
All people observe three minutes' silence in memory of President Kim Il Sung 
  Pyongyang, July 8 (KCNA) -- Today is the third death anniversary of President Kim Il Sung.
   At noon, on July 8, all the Koreans observed three-minute silence and whistles  were blown by locomotives, vessels and all other units that had sounding facilities to honor the memory of the President.
   Flags were hoisted at half-mast at institutions and enterprises, on streets and at dwelling houses from July 7.

articles.title: Patriotic youths detained in s. Korea
articles.content:
Documentary film "Great Life in 1994" shown 
 Pyongyang, July 9 (KCNA) -- The documentary film "Great Life in 1994" on the brilliant revolutionary activities of President Kim Il Sung is being shown to mark his third death anniversary. 
   The film shows that the President led the implementation of the revolutionary economic strategy of the party and the work for reunification of the country and conducted energetic activities with foreigners without a day's rest even in the last year of his life. 
   The film was appreciated by senior party and Government officials, leading officials of national institutions, anti-Japanese revolutionary veterans, generals of the Korean People's Army and working people at the People's Palace of Culture on July 8.

articles.title: General strike warned in s. Korea
articles.content:
Press review 
 Pyongyang, July 10 (KCNA) -- Papers here today dedicate the front pages to the resolution "On exalting the great leader comrade Kim Il Sung's revolutionary life and immortal exploits for all ages" issued by the Workers' Party of Korea Central Committee and Central Military Commission and the DPRK National Defense Commission, Central People's Committee and Administration Council on July 8.
   Conspicuous in the press is news that Secretary Kim Jong Il saw a memorial art performance "Wholehearted songs with longing for the leader" given by the merited choir of the Korean People's Army (KPA) song and dance ensemble.
   Papers carry a letter Secretary Kim Jong Il received from Ri In Mo, incarnation of faith and will, on the eve of the third death anniversary of President Kim Il Sung. 
   They carry news that a monument to on-site guidance of President Kim Il Sung and Secretary Kim Jong Il was erected at a KPA unit.
   They come out with a revolutionary anecdote saying that the KPA soldiers owe their high sense of patriotism to Secretary Kim Jong Il. 
   Rodong Sinmun introduces the novel "Immortality", one of the series of novels "Immortal History", which deals with the revolutionary activities of President Kim Il Sung in 1994, the last year of his brilliant life.
   Papers give an account of a party for overseas compatriots and carry an article by Zhang Jinquan, son of Zhang Wei-Hua, on the great love and noble sense of obligation of the President on the occasion of his third death anniversary. 
   Rodong Sinmun informs the readers that commemorative events were held in different countries to mark the anniversary.
   Carried in the press are articles on the revolutionary activities and immortal feats of Kim Hyong Jik, an indomitable revolutionary fighter, on the occasion of his 103rd birth anniversary.
   Rodong Sinmun prints an article stressing that the decision made by the Chinese Party and Government to offer 80,000 tons of food to Korea free of charge gives encouragement to the struggle of the Korean people.
   The paper runs a statement of the north headquarters of the National Alliance of Youth and Students for the Country's Reunification denouncing the Kim Young Sam group's repressive moves against youth and students in south Korea.
   The paper reports that international solidarity with the struggle of the Korean people was expressed in different countries.
   Printed in Minju Joson is an article on the strife for arms market between the U.S. and the EU countries.
   Rodong Sinmun observes the Independence Day of Belarus and Minju Joson marks the anniversary of the victory of the Mongolian People's Revolution.

articles.content:
Party on 36th anniversary of DPRK-China friendship treaty 
Pyongyang, July 11 (KCNA) -- The Korean Committee for Cultural Relations with Foreign Countries and the Central Committee of the Korea-China Friendship Association gave a Party on Thursday to mark the 36th anniversary of the Korea-China treaty of friendship, cooperation and mutual assistance.
   Chairman of the State Commission of Science and Technology Choe Hui Jong, who is also Chairman of the friendship association, in his speech said that the two parties, Governments and peoples have made strenuous efforts to strengthen and develop the friendship to meet the demands of the two peoples since the conclusion of the treaty.
   He wished the fraternal Chinese people new progress in consolidating the return of Hong Kong to China, making successful preparation for the 15th National Congress of the Communist Party of China (CPC) and attaining the reunification of the whole country under the leadership of the CPC headed by the respected comrade Jiang Zemin.
   Wan Yongxiang, Chinese Ambassador to Korea, expressed confidence that the great friendship created and developed by the proletarian revolutionaries of the old generation of the two countries would be further developed without fail thanks to the common concern of the leaders of the new generation and concerted efforts of the peoples of the two countries. 
   He added that he believed the diligent and brave Korean people would make their country ever more prosperous and beautiful under the leadership of Secretary Kim Jong Il.
   The North Hamgyong Provincial Committee of the Friendship Association gave a party also on Thursday to mark the anniversary.

articles.title: New stamps issued in Korea
articles.content:
Rodong Sinmun on President Kim Il Sung's feats in building Gov't
Pyongyang, July 12 (KCNA) -- Rodong Sinmun today observes the 40th anniversary of the publication of the celebrated work of President Kim Il Sung "On Improving and Atrengthening the Work of County People's Committee in Accordance with New Circumstances" (July 12, 1957). 
   It carries an article on the President's feats in building the Government.
   The author of the article says: 
   The Korean people have led a dignified and happy life as masters of the state and society under the care of the people's Government, so they keenly feel what great feats the President performed by building a genuine people's Government. 
   The President built a Juche-type Government that meets the desire of the people and suits the actual situation of the country. 
   He long ago set forth the line of building a unique people's Government on the basis of the Juche idea and spared no pains to establish a new-type power to meet the demands of our people.
   He also led the people's Government to successfully perform its duty as householder responsible for the people's life.
   This great exploit could be performed only by the President, who put his  noble motto "The people are my god" into practice.
   He also led the people's Government to make its activities with revolutionary and popular methods.
   The President guided the Government officials to be faithful servants of the people in socialist society, saying they should not become bureaucrats. 
   As a result, the people's government has been constantly strengthened and our socialism centering on the popular masses defended.

Pyongyang, July 17 (KCNA) -- New Austrian Ambassador to Korea Gerhard Ziegler presented his credentials to Vice-President Pak Song Chol of the DPRK at the Mansudae Assembly Hall today.

articles.content:
Secy. Kim Jong Il, life of nation and saviour of mankind 
 Pyongyang, July 18 (KCNA) -- Ryomyong (daybreak), a magazine of the Central Committee of the National Democratic Front of South Korea, carried an article entitled the leader Kim Jong Il is life of the nation and the saviour of mankind written by Pang Kye Su, Former Professor of Politics of Korea University.
   The article said the Korean nation's dignity and honor have reached the meridian under the guidance of President Kim Il Sung and Secretary Kim Jong Il. 
   The world is now advancing along the orbit of independence indicated by Secretary  Kim Jong Il, it said.
   It further said:
   The entire nation entrust their destiny entirely to him and all mankind are revering and following him as the sun and their saviour. Because he has performed great feats for the nation and the world people and for the times and history, through brilliant ideological and theoretical activities and with distinguished and tested leadership in scores of years.
   It is also because the entire fellow countrymen and the world's progressives have realized the great truth that the existence of the Korean nation and the brilliant future of humankind can be ensured only when they uphold and follow Secretary Kim Jong il who is the greatest almighty man possessed of intelligence, virtues and courage.
   Touching on the exploits of Secretary Kim Jong Il, the article said: He further developed and enriched the immortal Juche idea as the great guiding idea for the era of independence so that the Korean nation could have the honor of being the great nation who produced the top brain of a big organism called mankind and who are led by him.
   It continued:
   Society in the north, which was built by President Kim Il Sung and is now being further developed by Secretary Kim Jong Il, fundamentally differs in idea, principle and way from all the past human societies as well as from present societies in different countries. That is an ideal society of new type, which has a peculiar structure centred on the popular masses and is run in a peculiar way.
   Secretary Kim Jong Il is the greatest saint whom the people all over the world reasonably long to have today on the threshold of the 21st century.
   Indeed, he is the life, dignity, honor and future of our nation. Our fellow countrymen will reunify the country and prosper forever with the pride of being the nation of Kim Il Sung and Kim Jong Il.
